attributes.action: Cut the VAT on sun lotion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to cut the VAT on sun lotion in recognition of its important role in protecting people from developing skin cancer. With over 70,000 (&believed by some to be 100,000) new diagnoses a year, skin cancer is currently the fastest growing form of cancer and treating it is estimated to cost the NHS in excess of £71 million per annum. This is a disgrace considering that skin cancer is also one of the most preventable forms of cancer.
